author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

It's a trivial one-line fix (of long-standing omission) 
to bring HBHE ZS simulation exactly to what's actually employed at P5 since early 2022... 
The effect on 2022 MC (with yet fairly low DC noise) is _marginal_, see default 2022 single-pion comparison w/wo this PR
 https://cms-docs.web.cern.ch/hcal-sw-validation/calo_scan_single_pi/13_0_X/13_0_0_pre2_run3_ZS_SOI_vs_13_0_0_pre2_run3_SinglePi/   

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l limited

#### If this PR is a backport 

No. But for any 2023-related MC studies with 12_6_X and with **high DC noise** conditions, a backport may be needed. 
To be clarified asap.
title: HCAL: make HBHE zero suppression simulation identical to the data-taking one for Run3
